Name: Boiling Array
Desc: The Trailblazer will have Super Armor throughout the battle. Each connected circuit has Stability that will be reduced when the Trailblazer receives DMG or casts a Signature. When a circuit's Stability drops to 0, all the effects it provides will be lost.

Name: Focus Stance
Desc: Basic Attacks and skill casts will generate Focus Energy. The more the Focus Energy, the more the DMG the Trailblazer will deal.
